content.question: One important drawback of the use of <math alttext="H C F Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>HCFCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> as a replacement for <math alttext="C F Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CFCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is that <math alttext="H C F Cs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>HCFCs</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: biomagnify in food chains in the Arctic ecosystem
combine with water vapor to form acid precipitation
are greenhouse gases that contribute to climate change
react with carbon monoxide (<math alttext="C O " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) to form ozone in the troposphere

content.answer: are greenhouse gases that contribute to climate change

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
